kw.arg: Test Verfier Mise A Jour System

test.doc: Verifies system update functionality - Navigates to system update section - Checks for available updates - Supports both French and English interfaces

suite.doc: Tests for system update verification - Verifies system update functionality - Supports both French and English interfaces
